text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump What could @DonaldJTrumpJr possibly write about?

1. How to watch your Mistress catch COVID-19 after telling her COVID-19 was a HOAX

2. How my father cheated on all his wives

3. My father taught me that it was OK to walk out on my wife and children for a piece of ass.
